description: Divisible only by primes congruent to 1 mod 8.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: ok[n_] := And @@ (#1[[2]] == 1 && Mod[#1[[1]], 8] == 1 & ) /@ FactorInteger[n]; Select[ Range[2000], ok] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Mar 09 2012 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..2000] | forall{d: d in PrimeDivisors(n) | d mod 8 eq 1}]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 20 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Offset changed from 0 to 1 by _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 20 2012
